page.title: 19THE PONTELAND OBSERVER
page.content: { The Ponteland Observer}was first published in October 1982.It was started as{Pontelands Independant {newspaper}but later went on to join the Tweeddale press_group.The paper is sold in newsagents all over the area including Heddon,Belsay,Kingston Park and Ponteland. The main features which have appeared in the paper recently are the fire at Ponteland Middle School and the explosion at the Cantonese Restaurant in Darras Hall.To get their stories, the staff of the Ponteland Observer ring up the{Fire {Brigade}and the police every day. They also keep in touch with all the major organisations in Ponteland and ask them to send reports of their meetings etc.Altogether,the Ponteland Observer helps to create a community atmosphere in the village of Ponteland.
